    <script type="text/javascript" >
        $(document).on("click", ".yearItem > a", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            $(this).siblings("ul").slideToggle();

        $(document).on("click", ".hideLightbox", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            $(".css-lightbox").fadeOut();
            $(".css-lightbox-tint").fadeOut();
        });

        $(function () {

            //simpleLightbox.js
            $('.imageGallery1 a').simpleLightbox();
            $('.imageGallery2 a').simpleLightbox();
            $('.imageGallery3 a').simpleLightbox();
            $('.imageGallery4 a').simpleLightbox();


            $(".colorbox-rns a").colorbox({ fastIFrame: false, iframe: true, width: "80%", height: "80%", });

                $(".inline").colorbox({ inline: true });
           
                $(".iframe").colorbox({ fastIFrame: false, iframe: true, width: "470px", height: "685px", scrolling: false });
                $(".iframeSmall").colorbox({
                    fastIFrame: false, iframe: true, width: "520px", height: "340px", scrolling: false, className:"extraMargin"
                    
                });
                   
  
            
                $(".VideoWidget").colorbox({ height: 340, width: 600, "iframe": true, href: function () { return this.href.replace("https://youtu.be/", "https://www.youtube.com/embed/").replace("http://youtu.be/", "http://www.youtube.com/embed/") + "?wmode=transparent&rel=0&showinfo=0&controls=1&autoplay=1;" } });

            $(".simpleCarousel").each(function () {
                $(this).data("isAnimating", false);
                if ($(this).hasClass("pagerBottom")) {
                    $(this).append("<ul class='simplePager'></ul>");
                }
                else {
                    $(this).prepend("<ul class='simplePager'></ul>");
                }
                $(this).children("h2").prependTo(this);
                for (i = 0; i < $(".simpleSlides > div", this).length; i++) {
                   
                    $(this).children(".simplePager").append("<li class='"+ (i == 0 ? " selected" : "") + "'> <span>"+(i+1)+"</span></li>");
                }
                if($(".simpleSlides > div", this).length > 3)
                {
                $(this).prepend("<a href='#' class='simpleBack'><img src='/img/icons/white-arrow-left.png' alt='prev' style='width:13px; height:13px; padding:8px 2px 8px 0;'/></a>").prepend("<a href='#' class='simpleForward'><img src='/img/icons/white-arrow-right.png' alt='next' style='width:13px; height:13px; padding:8px 0 8px 2px;'/></a>");
                }
            });
        });
        $(document).on("click", ".simpleForward", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var parent = $(this).parents(".simpleCarousel");
           
            if (!parent.data("isAnimating")) {
                parent.data("isAnimating", true);


                var prevLi = $(this).siblings(".simplePager").children(".selected").removeClass("selected").prev("li");
                if(prevLi.length == 0)
                {
                    prevLi = $(this).siblings(".simplePager").children("li").last();
                }
                prevLi.addClass("selected");


                $(".pressReleaseBriefItem").first().fadeOut(200, function () {
                    $(".pressReleaseBrief").append($(this));
                    $(".pressReleaseBriefItem").first().fadeIn(200);

                });

                var slides = $(this).siblings(".simpleSlides");
                var slide = $(this).siblings(".simpleSlides").children("div").first();
                slide.animate({ "margin-left": -slide.outerWidth() + "px" }, function () {
                    parent.data("isAnimating", false);
                    slide.appendTo(slides).css({ "margin-left": "0px" });
                });
            }
        });
        $(document).on("click", ".simpleBack", function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var parent = $(this).parent(".simpleCarousel");
            if (!parent.data("isAnimating")) {
                parent.data("isAnimating", true);

                var prevLi = $(this).siblings(".simplePager").children(".selected").removeClass("selected").next("li");
                if (prevLi.length == 0) {
                    prevLi = $(this).siblings(".simplePager").children("li").first();
                }
                prevLi.addClass("selected");

                var slides = $(this).siblings(".simpleSlides");
                var slide = $(this).siblings(".simpleSlides").children("div").last();
                $(".pressReleaseBriefItem").first().fadeOut(200,function () {
                    $(".pressReleaseBriefItem").last().prependTo($(".pressReleaseBrief"));
                    $(".pressReleaseBriefItem").first().fadeIn(200);

                });

                slide.prependTo(slides).css({ "margin-left": -slide.outerWidth() + "px" }).animate({ "margin-left": "0px" }, function () { parent.data("isAnimating", false); });
            }

            
        });

                 });*/
                 window.open(url);
                }           
        
        
    </script>

     <script type="text/javascript">
         jQuery(document).ready(function () {
             var offset = 220;
             var duration = 500;
             jQuery(window).scroll(function () {
                 if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
                     jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
                 } else {
                     jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
                 }
             });

             jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function (event) {
                 event.preventDefault();
                 jQuery('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, duration);
                 return false;
             })
         });
   


    // Cookie Banner
(function($) {
    var COOKIE_NAME = "cookie-policy-agreed";

    $(document).ready(function() {
        var $cookieBanner = $("#cookie-policy-banner");
        $cookieBanner.css("display", "none");
        //$cookieBanner.slideDown("fast");
        if (!getCookie(COOKIE_NAME)) {
            $cookieBanner.css("display", "block");
        }

        $cookieBanner.find(".close").unbind("click").click(function(e) {
            $cookieBanner.slideUp("fast");
            setCookie(COOKIE_NAME, true, 365 * 5);
            e.preventDefault();
        });
    });
    
    function setCookie(name,value,days) {
        if (days) {
            var date = new Date();
            date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
            var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
        }
        else var expires = "";
        document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
    }

    function getCookie(name) {
        var nameEQ = name + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
        for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
            var c = ca[i];
            while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
            if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
        }
        return null;
    }

    function deleteCookie(name) {
        setCookie(name,"",-1);
    }
    

})(jQuery);
